helpset.help: exit exit compiler help general help help [cmd] help on a particular command list <item> list a particular compiler item mode <name> switch to a particular interactive mode run run compiler to completion/error runto <n> run compiler to stage <n> step step through compiler stages show <n> show a particular parse tree (XML style) sshow <n> show a particular parse tree (S-exp style) version show compiler version versions show versions of all compiler components
Steps execution to the next compiler stage.
Run the compiler until it completes or encounters an error.
Run to a specific compiler stage.
List particular compiler item: stages - compiler stages files - files for compilation trees - top-level parse trees (brief) langs - compiler supported languages
Show version information for all compiler components.
names list known names print <name> print a particular name eval <exp> evaluates an expression (reduces to some sort of normal form) pexp <exp> prints an expression without evaluating it
Displays a list of known names (typically escape analysis definitions).
Pretty-prints a particular name in its original form.
